name: Alien Ark
description:
Alien Ark - Planet Exploration

Please support us by rating the game: http://itch.io/jam/libgdxjam/rate/50746

Alien Ark is a planet exploration game where you can craft your crew members to improve your space ship. For crafting you need artifacts that you can find on the different planets. All planets are procedurally generated and have individual landscapes. Beside that you can participate on racing events on the planet surface.

Alien Ark was developed by Nuke The Moon and friends during the #libGDXjam. This game jam was between the 19th December 2015 and the 18th January 2016.

You can find some tips how to play here Tips And Tricks

You can find the sources of the game on GitHub

Let us know what you would improve and what you like. Use the comments..
